text: There are things colder then cold

My smile is full of blades

Drink from the data stream.
I can decode anything with a grenade launcher. —Saint-14
Delivering the inevitable, one pull at a time.
But where is your fate, and who brings it to you?

A peace born from violence is no peace at all. —Lady Efrideet
Praedyth's fall isn't over… because it hasn't happened yet… and it will happen again.
Praedyth will never fall.
Ah, but which number? Why it and no others? —Lakshmi-2
Initiate or suppress.
Move with the current.
Move with the current.
It's versatile. By itself, it's nothing, just an empty tube. But that's its deceptive beauty; it's all about what you fill it with. What you make it. What you make it do. —Banshee-44
Do not say a little in many words—say a great deal in a few.
No stars overhead. Best not to look up. —Amanda Holliday

In the abyss of time, all the lines converge… upon you.

It breaks the rules of reality as ruthlessly as it shatters your foes.

All doors open before you.
